com.quanghoa.hoavotwitter.adapter

Class TwitterAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseAdapter
      • com.quanghoa.hoavotwitter.adapter.TwitterAdapter

  • public class TwitterAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
    Make a bridge between the data and the user interface, making a view for each item in the data set

        public View getView(int position,
                    View convertView,
                    ViewGroup parent)
        Create the view for each twitter item. The view can be reused.
        Parameters:
